content.question: Which of the following explains the most significant long-term consequence of the ideas expressed in the passage?

choices.label: The “separate but equal” doctrine was established as Constitutionally acceptable.
The value of “all men are created equal” was reaffirmed both in law and in American political culture.
African Americans migrated to the South in search of the American dream.
Congress passed an amendment to the United States Constitution to include the notion of equality in American law.

content.answer: The value of “all men are created equal” was reaffirmed both in law and in American political culture.

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Explain how the implications of the argument or perspective in the source may affect political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
